message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $12,000. I believe it holds significant value and would be a worthwhile investment for you.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but given my budget constraints, I am only able to offer $9,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I understand your position, but the product's value is quite high. I could consider letting it go for $10,500. It's a fair compromise.
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my situation. Based on my budget, I can offer $10,000 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
